title: Rugby-England call up scrumhalf Wigglesworth
text:
February 5, 2018 / 5:10 PM / Updated 22 minutes ago Rugby-England call up scrumhalf Wigglesworth   
LONDON, Feb 5 (Reuters) - England have called scrumhalf Richard Wigglesworth into a 32-man squad for their next Six Nations game against Wales, the RFU   34-year-old Wigglesworth replaced Ben Youngs who was forced off with a knee injury early in the 46-15 opening victory over Italy in Rome on Sunday. 
Hooker Luke Cowan-Dickie was also added to the squad for the match against Wales at Twickenham on Saturday. 
Number eight Nathan Hughes will join the camp this week to get his knee injury assessed. Reporting by Ed Osmond; Editing by Christian Radnedge
